website_summaries.verdict: Meticulously designed for a very specific hardcore audience, Bloodborne is a marvel along those parameters. But if you're the type of player looking for a way to unwind through a game, look the other way.
pros: Bloodborne is an immensely challenging yet endlessly rewarding action-adventure game that has the potential for hours upon hours of gameplay time
It makes clever use of an online connection and introduces unique mechanics within its combat and weapon systems
cons: The barrier-to-entry on Bloodborne isn't easily bested
The game's biggest problem is its inaccessibility, to the point where you really aren't told what to do or where to go
To the mainstream or even seasoned gamer, it may seem insurmountable

customer_reviews.title: Awful gameplay and headache graphics.
customer_reviews.text: You can yap all you want about "is supposed to be hard" and "blah blah blah" but there is a difference between something that takes genuine skill to play and a piece of crap slapped together with RNG. I'm not digging my way through 55+ enemies every time ONE of them gets a lucky TWO hits in. I'm also NOT leaving a SINGLE person alive behind me. Save your money. This game was barely good in 2015 and is utter crap now, relying on non-skill related components to simply slow you down, not actually challenge you..

customer_reviews.title: If you like Dark Souls you will like this game as it ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like Dark Souls you will like this game as it improves on it it almost every way. The graphics are fantastic. They are dark and well stylized to create an ominous world with vicious and disgusting enemies. Mechanically it feels better than dark souls since they normalized stats for most of the gear. This makes new gear more situational instead of being strictly better than others. Experienced players will enjoy this since the game is more about patterns, dodging and parrying as your defense wont improve significantly. Overall the level design, unique bosses and atmosphere are top-notch. One of the best PS4 games available if not the best.

customer_reviews.title: Best game I've played in a decade. The lore is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hardcore gamer, but this is the best game I have played in a decade. The lore is very deep and it has reminiscences of Evangelion and, of course, the works of HP Lovecraft. The game itself is difficult and even frustrating, but after a while you get the hold of it. I recommend watching the walkthrough videos of EpicNameBro in YouTube, not only for the advice on the game, but also to get an interesting point of view on the lore. Actually, the lore is what most contributed to me liking the game.

customer_reviews.title: YOU DIED
customer_reviews.text: Get used to seeing that headline. This is a game that tolerates few mistakes and expects you to quickly learn the rules and get better. Despite it being more frenetic and offensive than Dark Souls games, it is not a hack-n-slash, and if you don't learn to balance offense with defense and know when to fight vs when to run, you will die, and die, and die, until you get frustrated and give up. If you do this, it would be a shame because the atmosphere and design of Bloodborne is unlike anything I've seen in a long time. If you've been longing for a new Castlevania game, this is it just under a new name.

The lore in this game is fantastic and most of it is even more convoluted than Dark Souls. The gameplay is the complete opposite of Dark Souls; it's fast, twitchy, you need to react quickly and be as aggressive as possible. It took me a long time to get really used to it, having played all the previous games where you take your time attacking and rely on a shield. Once you get the hang of this game, and start grasping the lore, you will be hooked.

The grinding for Blood Echoes (which acts as both the currency and exp) can get grueling and tedious after awhile, but the strategies needed in killing the bosses and the need for players to learn from their mistakes more than make up for it. If you're looking for a fun romp through a beast-infested gothic city plagued by a curse, then this is the game for you.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME!
customer_reviews.text: If you've played Demon and/or Dark Souls, and haven't played this yet, what the heck are you waiting for??? If you haven't played a Souls game before, this is a pretty good place to start. Be warned, it's hard. Very hard. But also very rewarding. Don't buy a guide, don't read an online walkthrough. Explore the game and learn from your mistakes. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: MarcT787

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play and it was at a good deal. Didn't end up playing it much because I wasn't in the mood for it and it ended up not being my cup of tea. I traded it in and bought some used games. It was a good game, just got bored and have to much to do to try to learn a new system
customer_reviews.author: James Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: and even then it's not easy. And if you know this type of game
customer_reviews.text: The controls feel sluggish - this is not an issue with other games on the system. I thought it might be input lag but that doesn't seem to be the case. Want to play online with your friends? Not at low levels, and even then it's not nearly as easy as many other games. And if you know this type of game, you know it's very difficult. Still, the game looks and sounds great and is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game that needs no introduction.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that hasn't been said. It's Bloodborne. An amazing game that needs no review to speak volumes of its amazment. If you're a beginner at gaming, know this is hard. If you are coming from the Soul games, know this is easy. Also, keep in mind the first four hours are a living hell. Be prepared to die a lot before you get a hang of it and get your character moving in the direction you want. The game gets easier if you tackle it with common sense.
customer_reviews.author: David Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and rewarding variation on the Dark Souls formula
customer_reviews.text: Challenging and rewarding just like Dark Souls but with different mechanics. Combat is faster with more emphasis on being aggressive but the learning curve isn't too steep if you've played a Souls game before. The game design and atmosphere are all well done and interesting. Didn't experience any game breaking bugs or hiccups aside from a few rage inducing incidences of enemies clipping through walls. The only thing I'm not sure about is replayability. There's only so many ways you can approach combat with this game. There aren't nearly as many "builds" and equipment variations as the Dark Souls games
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game after you've gone through the fire
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I had a very difficult time adjusting to this game. I pretty much spent 10 hours on the first few levels and took me forever to beat the first boss. The trick is to be patient, watch other gamers and how they handle certain situations, and you'll pick it up. TIMING is the key part here. When you learn to dodge and parry, you'll realize that it's not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very challenging game for those who want to be push ...
customer_reviews.text: Very challenging game for those who want to be push to the limits and a unique way of story telling in which the story is told through the collection of items obtain through out the journey.
customer_reviews.author: ZaWarudo

customer_reviews.title: Great game got it as a back up copy.
customer_reviews.text: great game. Plat it a while back but wanted to get a physical copy on the side just in case something happens and lend to people.
customer_reviews.author: J_W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year or so ago. I beat it a while back while really enjoying it, and I'm ready to replay to game. Sure it's hard if you aren't used to the combat system in souls games. I'd say it was worth learning how to play these games. They have great worlds and atmosphere and the fighting gets so much fun when you realize what you can do with it. Plus summoning help online makes things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle P

customer_reviews.title: Hard but very addicting
customer_reviews.text: This game is hard at first but when you have learned the strategies, gameplay and enemies then it gets really fun and addicting. Definitely has a lot of replay value! This is my first soul game and won't be the last!
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: amazing game and great graphics
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game and graphics. I love how challenging and how beautifully gory and crude the game is the. The graphics are so real like and stunning
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: i have had a huge amount of fun with this game
customer_reviews.text: I never played Dark Souls or Demon Souls. This game is the most difficult game i have ever played. It is still thoroughly satisfying to get your game on, once you get it. My friends say that overall the game is EASIER than the Dark Souls games, in many respects, as well as smaller. I would give this game a 4.5 star review because i feel that the NPC's mouths should move when they speak, isn't this next-gen yet? Other than that, i have had a huge amount of fun with this game, testing my gaming limits and discovering the world of Yharnam.
customer_reviews.author: requiem

customer_reviews.title: Bloodborne
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay In a nutshell: The best parts of Devil May Cry series (3 especially) mixed with the some of the best parts of the Demon/Dark Souls series. Really pushes the action while keeping the difficulty up there for anyone whose used to hand holding. Not for everyone, but bloody perfect for the niche it fills.
customer_reviews.author: M. Storm

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I took the easy way out, but there’s no better feeling than unlocking another gate to get back to a safer area. I need more From Software Please!

customer_reviews.text: Dark souls based in cathulu lore. There's nothing more to say go check this game out.

customer_reviews.title: you're gonna die allot
customer_reviews.text: freaking rage inducing game with allot of satisfaction once completed!
customer_reviews.author: Rizz8Cinco

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game. You start out the game by creating ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game. You start out the game by creating your character. There are numerous options you have to edit your character from how full their lips are, to exact skin tones. This game is pretty challenging and I appreciate that because it makes you put time and effort into the game. The graphics really display the power of the Playstation 4. This is a must have for your PS4 collection.
customer_reviews.author: Bali

customer_reviews.title: Brutal; Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake- this game is hard, especially for a more casual gamer (such as myself). However, BECAUSE it is so difficult it is highly addictive. You work so hard to progress/beat bosses that when you are finally rewarded, it is almost euphoric. I have literally found myself grunting out loud and flipping off the TV as a boss goes down. I can't say any other game has affected me this way. Get ready to waste a lot of your free time ;) 5/5 highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: cysmc

customer_reviews.title: I need my fix...some more Bloodborne. Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Finally there's game out that I actually think about even when I'm not playing it. Best game I've played in awhile. My only complaint is the load times after I die (because I die a lot...lol) & before & after hunters dream. Other than that it's a solid masterpiece!
customer_reviews.author: Iamhoss22

customer_reviews.title: Best game I played in 2015.
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best games I played in all of 2015. In fact, it probably is the best game I played in 2015. Ruthlessly hard at times, but like all the titles in the Souls series it gives you a sense of accomplishment when you finally do beat a difficult section/boss. Would buy again. A+

customer_reviews.title: I knew what I was getting myself into.

I recommend this game for its magnificent history, verbal content, sound, graphics and environment in which it develops. You should definitely play it. RATING 100 points
customer_reviews.author: Vinicio

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent game. Period.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a PS4 you can't miss this awesome title. This was my first "Souls Game" and I just loved it. Is it difficult? Yes, but just at first. Once you get past the first painfull hours dying until you get the concept of the game you'll enjoy every minute of it. The combat is superb. The difficulty and the game design makes it very rewarding and force you to level up and kick every enemy's ass. The secrets, treasures and level design are just awesome. Don't leave it at your first try and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Granados

customer_reviews.title: Super hard, super fun
customer_reviews.text: Super hard, super fun. I absolutely loved the world they created for this game. I just didn't want to put it down because I wanted to see where it took me next. The enemy designs are great, as are the boss designs. Some of them are so crazy and unique that my jaw dropped when I saw what they were doing. Great game, definitely a must-play for PS4 owners.

However, as the game starts rolling it get really enjoyable. The second you beat that first boss thats all you need. Great game lives up to the hype

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, impressive, and impossible.
customer_reviews.text: This game is beautiful, brilliantly designed, and nearly impossible to play for the average gamer. I appreciate a challenge as much as the next guy, but I couldn't get past the first level without driving myself absolutely insane. If you're a Dark Souls fan I'm sure you'll love this game, but let's just say it's not for everyone.

customer_reviews.text: This game has to be the hardest game ever made. Don't take my word for it, google it. But besides making you want to chuck your controller at the tv every now and then, it's amazing! The graphics, the story line, the game play, its not one thing about this game I would change. A definite must own for all ps4 owners.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game

customer_reviews.title: Bloody good time
customer_reviews.text: While the game can be very frustrating at times and I feel it has its flaws, overall, Bloodborne is a nice challenge and offers plenty of variety in enemy design, combat, weapons, and world building. It's dark and scary, fast and frenetic, and a great time...just beware the DLC. It's stupidly hard and I bashed my head against a wall for 8 hours on the last boss...and not in the fun way. Also, I got this delivered to Japan and it arrived in good condition, relatively quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive and Entertaining, a PS4 staple
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest games ever made, Bloodborne takes the difficulty curve of Dark Souls and introduces a fast paced dodge/attack rhythm that breathes new life into the game. If you enjoy RPGs and are searching for a deeply rewarding challenge, look no further.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not as good as the Soul series
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not as good as the Soul series. Very dark and depressing. As unforgiving as the Soul series. You will die a lot. Bosses are easier once you know how to fight them. Get the Giant Cannon and it will kill most bosses in 3 to 4 shots, if you use blood bullets and reinforcing powder.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Strandberg

customer_reviews.title: Challenging but fun
customer_reviews.text: For fans of Dark Souls, this game is right up your alley. Gameplay that will challenge you and may even make you rage quit sometimes, but you still come back for more and try again! Bloodborne will test your skill (and some cases your patience or maybe even your sanity) and will keep you hooked until the very end.
customer_reviews.author: Kraven L.

customer_reviews.title: Having played all previous Souls games, this was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Having played all previous Souls games, this was a no brainer purchase. Its difficult at first to get used to not having a shield to hide behind but after a while I got the hang of the mechanic and it works quite well. My biggest gripe is the lack of check/save points in the game, there is nowhere near as many as the previous souls games had.
customer_reviews.author: Krys Kory

customer_reviews.title: The most fun I've had with a video game in ages
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Once you've learned the basics it's very addictive, you're encouraged to try to master it. I've played the Witcher 3 before this and while indeed two completely different games, Witcher 3 is boring in comparison. Yes, the game is difficult but difficult in a good way, nothing overwhelming though I would say it may be more suited to gamers who are willing to grind through a game; explorer ever corner, take their time developing their characters and weapons. No fan of action RPGs should miss this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint of heart
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for an easy game, you are going to want to skip this one!! There is no difficulty settings so everyone plays at the same level. You can't save the game just anywhere, you have to make it to save points around the map. The bosses are very challenging, and you want to make sure you "beef up" your hero before taking them on. I really enjoyed this game because it was difficult, you had to figure things out on your own (they don't spoon feed you anything), and the game was unpredictable. Hours and Hours of play and quite a bit of swearing at the TV, great fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian LaFlamme

customer_reviews.title: Blown away on my first FromSoftware game!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a classic hack and slash background (GoW, Devil May Cry) this thing was VERY challenging at first. I did some research and stuck with it and now I am obsessed with this game. Excellent work. I give it 4 stars because the load times are insane. If they could speed up the load times this game would be basically perfect.
customer_reviews.author: The A.

customer_reviews.title: The best, scariest, most frustrating yet satisfying game I've ever played.
customer_reviews.text: After being out of the gaming world since pretty much only playing TonyHawk games on a used ps2, Bloodborne was my first plunge into modern gaming. It's absolutely beautiful and an insanely rewarding and terrifying experience. I have to mentally and emotionally prepare myself before playing every time. As frustrating as I had heard it was going to be, but it has a fast learning curve. It's as much a memory game as a suspense filled nightmare. The variety of enemies with unique attack speeds and timings provides a test of offensive and defensive combat tactics. You'd be a fool not to get this game.

product_meta.title: Bloodborne
product_meta.description: Introducing Bloodborne, the latest Action RPG from renowned Japanese developer FromSoftware, exclusively for the PlayStation 4 system. Face your fears as you search for answers in the ancient city of Yharnam, now cursed with a strange endemic illness spreading through the streets like wildfire. Danger, death and madness lurk around every corner of this dark and horrific world, and you must discover its darkest secrets in order to survive. A Terrifying New World: Journey to a horror-filled gothic city where deranged mobs and nightmarish creatures lurk around every corner. Strategic Action Combat: Armed with a unique arsenal of weaponry, including guns and saw cleavers, you'll need wits, strategy and reflexes to take down the agile and intelligent enemies that guard the city's dark secrets. A New Generation of Action RPG: Stunningly detailed gothic environments, atmospheric lighting, and advanced new online experiences showcase the power and prowess of the PlayStation 4 system.
feature_bullets: A Terrifying New World: Journey to a horror-filled gothic city where deranged mobs and nightmarish creatures lurk around every corner.

Strategic Action Combat: Armed with a unique arsenal of weaponry, including guns and saw cleavers, you'll need wits, strategy and reflexes to take down the agile and intelligent enemies that guard the city's dark secrets.
A New Generation of Action RPG: Stunningly detailed gothic environments, atmospheric lighting, and advanced new online experiences showcase the power and prowess of the PlayStation 4 system.

Ever-changing Chalice Dungeons to Explore: Use holy chalices to gain entrance to a network of vast underground ruins, filled with traps, beasts, and rewards, to explore and conquer alone or with others. These procedurally generated dungeons offer brand new challenges to master, and can be uploaded or shared with friends.
